problem_names:
lemma fun_ordI:
  assumes "\<And>x. ord (f x) (g x)"
  shows "fun_ord ord f g"

lemma fun_ordD:
  assumes "fun_ord ord f g"
  shows "ord (f x) (g x)"

lemma mono_fun_fun_cnv:
  assumes "\<And>d. monotone (fun_ord ordA) ordB (\<lambda>x. F x d)"
  shows "monotone (fun_ord ordA) (fun_ord ordB) F"
translations:
lemma fun_ordI:
  assumes "\<And>x. ord (f x) (g x)"
  shows "fun_ord ord f g"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fun_ord ord f g

proof (prove)
using this:
  ord (f ?x) (g ?x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fun_ord ord f g

proof (prove)
using this:
  ord (f ?x) (g ?x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x. ord (f x) (g x)

lemma fun_ordD:
  assumes "fun_ord ord f g"
  shows "ord (f x) (g x)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ord (f x) (g x)

proof (prove)
using this:
  fun_ord ord f g

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ord (f x) (g x)

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>x. ord (f x) (g x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ord (f x) (g x)

lemma mono_fun_fun_cnv:
  assumes "\<And>d. monotone (fun_ord ordA) ordB (\<lambda>x. F x d)"
  shows "monotone (fun_ord ordA) (fun_ord ordB) F"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. monotone (fun_ord ordA) (fun_ord ordB) F

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y. fun_ord ordA x y \<Longrightarrow> fun_ord ordB (F x) (F y)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y xa. fun_ord ordA x y \<Longrightarrow> ordB (F x xa) (F y xa)

proof (prove)
using this:
  monotone (fun_ord ordA) ordB (\<lambda>x. F x ?d)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y xa. fun_ord ordA x y \<Longrightarrow> ordB (F x xa) (F y xa)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fun_lub Sup = Sup

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>A x. Sup {y. \<exists>f\<in>A. y = f x}) = Sup

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>f g. \<forall>x. f x \<le> g x) = (\<le>)
